https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wUUC9Y2jb7Us5zkJ52PsVWPWBgT.jpg Based on an Indian Bengali short story by Sunil Gangopadhyay, Anuradha plays cupid and brings Shantanu and Kalpana together but a freak accident distances Kalpana and him. Shantanu then realizes that Anuradha is the one who truly loves him. Arike
